mapper.select: SELECT id_person as idPerson, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName, phone_number as phoneNumber FROM person WHERE id_person = #{idPerson} and status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE person SET id_person=#{idPerson}, first_name=#{firstName},last_name=#{lastName},phone_number=#{phoneNumber},status=1,tx_date=#{transaction.txDate}, tx_id_user=#{transaction.txIdUser},tx_host=#{transaction.txHost},tx_update=#{transaction.txUpdate} WHERE id_person=#{idPerson} and status = 1
